com.cims.controller

类 AccountsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cims.controller.AccountsController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/accounts")
public class AccountsController
extends java.lang.Object
    处理用户的登录/注册请求.
    作者:
    Luo Guofu

      • loginView

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView loginView(@RequestParam(value="logout",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                                                                                                          boolean isLogout,
                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="forward",required=false,defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String forwardUrl,
                                                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        显示用户的登录页面.
        参数:
        isLogout - 是否处于登出状态
        forwardUrl - 登录后跳转的地址(相对路径)
        request - HttpServletRequest对象
        response - HttpResponse对象
        返回:
        包含登录页面信息的ModelAndView对象

      • loginAction

        @RequestMapping(value="/login.action",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> loginAction(@RequestParam(value="username",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="password",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        处理用户的登录请求.
        参数:
        username - 用户名
        password - 密码(已使用MD5加密)
        request - HttpServletRequest对象
        返回:
        一个包含登录验证结果的Map对象

        @RequestMapping(value="/register",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView registerView()

      • registerAction

        @RequestMapping(value="/register.action",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> registerAction(@RequestParam(value="username",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="password",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="email",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        处理用户注册的请求.
        参数:
        username - 用户名
        password - 密码
        email - 电子邮件地址
        request - HttpServletRequest对象
        返回:
        一个包含账户创建结果的Map对象

                                                                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

        response - HttpResponse对象
        返回:

      • resetPasswordAction

        @RequestMapping(value="/reset-password.action",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> resetPasswordAction(@RequestParam(value="oldPassword",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="password",required=true)
                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String password,
                                                                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        设置新密码
        参数:
        oldPassword - 原始密码(已使用MD5加密)
        password - 未加密的新密码
        request - HttpServletRequest对象
        返回:
        包含设置密码信息的Map对象
